mapper.select: SELECT U_ID, EXCHANGE, COUNT(*) AS orderCnt FROM T4_ORDER WHERE U_ID = #{uId} GROUP BY #{uId}, EXCHANGE

SELECT * FROM T4_ORDER O INNER JOIN T4_PRODUCT P ON O.P_NO = P.P_NO INNER JOIN T4_DELIVERY D ON O.O_NO = D.O_NO INNER JOIN ( SELECT O.O_NO, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM T4_ORDER O INNER JOIN T4_DELIVERY D ON O.O_NO = D.O_NO INNER JOIN T4_PRODUCT P ON O.P_NO = P.P_NO WHERE D_STATE = '업체확인중' AND O.O_NO = O.O_NO AND EXCHANGE = '' GROUP BY O.O_NO)A ON O.O_NO = A.O_NO WHERE D_STATE = '업체확인중' ORDER BY O.O_NO ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T4_ORDER O INNER JOIN T4_PRODUCT P ON O.P_NO = P.P_NO INNER JOIN T4_DELIVERY D ON O.O_NO = D.O_NO WHERE D_STATE = '업체확인중';
